update active_index set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, active_type = #{activeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_tmp = #{isTmp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort_key=#{sortKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, confirm_active_id=#{confirmActiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_group=#{dataGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_variant=#{isVariant,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update active_index set name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT id,name,active_type ,project_id from active_index WHERE
project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND active_type in(1,2)
AND is_variant =#{isVariant,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by update_time desc

SELECT COUNT(*) from active_index WHERE
project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND active_type in(1,2)
AND is_variant =#{isVariant,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by update_time desc
SELECT name from active_index WHERE id =#{val,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
FROM `active_index` WHERE id IN ( SELECT active_index_id FROM `active_index_config` WHERE id IN ( SELECT active_index_config_id FROM `active_index_config_condition` WHERE ref_active_id = #{activeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) AND is_tmp = #{isTmp,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT id,name FROM `active_index` WHERE project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND is_variant = 1 order by update_time desc

SELECT DISTINCT m.uname as name,count(*) as value FROM `active_index` as ac JOIN p_project_member as m on ac.create_user=m.uid where ac.is_variant=1 and ac.project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}GROUP BY ac.create_user
